testCases.query: Create a PR for my feature branch
expectedBehavior: Runs pre-flight checks (branch protection, uncommitted changes)
Launches 3 parallel validation agents (security, tests, quality)
Creates PR with conventional title format: type(#issue): description
Includes summary, changes list, and test plan in PR body

testCases.query: Create a quick draft PR without validation
expectedBehavior: Pushes branch if not already on remote
Creates PR directly with gh pr create
Gathers context from git log and diff

testCases.query: Create a PR that depends on PR #50
expectedBehavior: Sets base branch to the dependency PR branch
Runs pre-flight checks including upstream sync
Verifies branch is not main or dev

testCases.query: Review the open PR on my branch
expectedBehavior: Recognizes this is a review request, not PR creation
Suggests using the review-pr skill instead
